longDescription.heading: What is Musang Forum?
longDescription.content: Musang Forum is a live chat desktop application that me and my friends made during summer break. In the app, users can create forums, participate in open discussions, and engage with posts in real-time. Some features includes, user authentication, real-time chat, responsive UI, themes. This application was made with Java (JavaFX for front-end library), JavaFX CSS for styling, Java Sockets for real-time messaging (client-server architecture), and MySQL for the database engine.

longDescription.heading: Features
longDescription.content:
User authentication: Sign-up and sign-in functionality for user access control.
Real-time messaging: Join a forum and chat with others in real-time.
Search & Filter: Quickly find forums and discussions based on criteria.
Theming: Customize the appearance of the application through themes.
